chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
c: R
b: R
a: R

Goal:
a + b <> a + c -> b <> c

Premises:
*** [ R : Set ]
Rsqr_sol_eq_0_0 : forall (a : nonzeroreal) (b c x : R), Delta_is_pos a b c -> a * xÂ² + b * x + c = 0 -> x = sol_x1 a b c \/ x = sol_x2 a b c
canonical_Rsqr : forall (a : nonzeroreal) (b c x : R), a * xÂ² + b * x + c = a * (x + b / (2 * a))Â² + (4 * a * c - bÂ²) / (4 * a)
sol_x1 = fun (a : nonzeroreal) (b c : R) => (- b + sqrt (Delta a b c)) / (2 * a) : nonzeroreal -> R -> R -> R Arguments sol_x1 _ (_ _)%R_scope
fe : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R -> R
RiemannInt_SF : forall a b : R, StepFun a b -> R
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
RiemannInt_P1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> Riemann_integrable f b a
Delta_is_pos = fun (a : nonzeroreal) (b c : R) => 0 <= Delta a b c : nonzeroreal -> R -> R -> Prop Arguments Delta_is_pos _ (_ _)%R_scope
phi_sequence : (nat -> posreal) -> forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> nat -> StepFun a b
sol_x2 = fun (a : nonzeroreal) (b c : R) => (- b - sqrt (Delta a b c)) / (2 * a) : nonzeroreal -> R -> R -> R Arguments sol_x2 _ (_ _)%R_scope
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Riemann_integrable f a b -> R
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Arguments Riemann_integrable _%function_scope (_ _)%R_scope
RiemannInt_P12 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b l : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b), a <= b -> RiemannInt pr3 = RiemannInt pr1 + l * RiemannInt pr2
StepFun_P28 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
StepFun_P32 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), IsStepFun (fun x : R => Rabs (f x)) a b
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)Â² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> l1 <> 0 -> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)Â² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> f1 x <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)Â² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
law_cosines : forall x0 y0 x1 y1 x2 y2 ac : R, let a := dist_euc x1 y1 x0 y0 in let b := dist_euc x2 y2 x0 y0 in let c := dist_euc x2 y2 x1 y1 in a * c * cos ac = (x0 - x1) * (x2 - x1) + (y0 - y1) * (y2 - y1) -> bÂ² = cÂ² + aÂ² - 2 * (a * c * cos ac)
StepFun_P34 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt_SF f) <= RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => Rabs (f x); pre := StepFun_P32 f |}
RiemannInt_P13 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b l : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b) (pr3 : Riemann_integrable (fun x : R => f x + l * g x) a b), RiemannInt pr3 = RiemannInt pr1 + l * RiemannInt pr2
RiemannInt_P8 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable f b a), RiemannInt pr1 = - RiemannInt pr2
Delta = fun (a : nonzeroreal) (b c : R) => bÂ² - 4 * a * c : nonzeroreal -> R -> R -> R Arguments Delta _ (_ _)%R_scope
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
Record StepFun (a b : R) : Type := mkStepFun { fe : R -> R; pre : IsStepFun fe a b } Arguments StepFun (_ _)%R_scope Arguments mkStepFun [a b]%R_scope [fe]%function_scope
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)Â² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
tan_plus : forall x y : R, cos x <> 0 -> cos y <> 0 -> cos (x + y) <> 0 -> 1 - tan x * tan y <> 0 -> tan (x + y) = (tan x + tan y) / (1 - tan x * tan y)
tan_minus : forall x y : R, cos x <> 0 -> cos y <> 0 -> cos (x - y) <> 0 -> 1 + tan x * tan y <> 0 -> tan (x - y) = (tan x - tan y) / (1 + tan x * tan y)
StepFun_P30 : forall (a b l : R) (f g : StepFun a b), RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => f x + l * g x; pre := StepFun_P28 l f g |} = RiemannInt_SF f + l * RiemannInt_SF g
Rmult_integral_contrapositive_currified : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 <> 0 -> r2 <> 0 -> r1 * r2 <> 0
RiemannInt_exists : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (un : nat -> posreal), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi_sequence un pr N)) l}
uniqueness_step1 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), limit1_in (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h : R => h <> 0) l1 0 -> limit1_in (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h : R => h <> 0) l2 0 -> l1 = l2
Rinv_neq_0_compat : forall r : R, r <> 0 -> / r <> 0
Rabs_no_R0 : forall r : R, r <> 0 -> Rabs r <> 0
IZR_neq : forall z1 z2 : Z, z1 <> z2 -> IZR z1 <> IZR z2
formule : forall (x h l1 l2 : R) (f1 f2 : R -> R), h <> 0 -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (f1 (x + h) / f2 (x + h) - f1 x / f2 x) / h - (l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)Â² = / f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1) + l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h)) - f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2) + l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)Â² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)
uniqueness_step3 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : R), limit1_in (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (fun h : R => h <> 0) l 0 -> derivable_pt_lim f x l
